PATIENT_ID: TEST_SBIRT_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-15 03:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-15 03:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 28-year-old male. Single vehicle MVC.
Trauma admission. Age 28. Alcohol on breath noted.
BP 130/82, HR 92, RR 16, GCS 15.
Screening for alcohol and substance use per protocol.
Drug screening and alcohol screening initiated.

[LAB] 2026-02-15 03:15:00
ETOH: 185 mg/dL. Blood alcohol elevated.
Urine drug screen positive for cannabinoids. UDS result documented.
CBC, CMP within normal limits.

[NURSING_NOTE] 2026-02-15 04:00:00
AUDIT-C completed: score 7 (male). AUDIT-C documented.
DAST-10 not performed (patient unable to cooperate initially).
Patient admits to regular alcohol use.
CIWA assessment ordered per protocol. CIWA initiated.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-15 05:00:00
SBIRT criteria met. Positive ETOH and positive UDS.
AUDIT-C score 7 exceeds threshold.
Brief intervention performed. Substance use screening completed.
Care team consult placed for substance use counseling.
